description: Growth function of an infinite cubic graph (number of nodes at distance n from fixed node).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
J. K. Haugland, Classification of certain subgraphs of the 3-dimensional grid., J. Graph Theory, 42 (2003), 34-60.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,2,-2,0,-1,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[-(x + 1) (2 x^8 - 4 x^7 + 3 x^6 - x^5 + 6 x^4 + 2 x^3 + 2 x^2 + x + 1)/((x - 1)^3 (x^2 + x + 1)^2), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2013 *)
author: Jan Kristian Haugland (jankrihau(AT)hotmail.com)
extensions: Links corrected by Jan Kristian Haugland (admin(AT)neutreeko.net), Mar 01 2009
